Download of common container file types.Action: Monitor Zeek http.log for file downloads with extensions .iso, .vhd, .arj, .gzip originating from external source IPs. Use frequency analysis to identify rare download types or sources. Correlate download events with subsequent host activity (e.g., mounting, extraction).

Execution of executable files or scripts.Action: Monitor Process Creation events (Windows Event ID 4688). Identify parent-child process relationships where the parent is associated with mounting/extraction utilities (e.g., explorer.exe -> mount operations, winrar.exe -> execution) and the command line indicates execution from a temporary mount point or extraction directory. Analyze execution patterns and command lines using descriptive statistics.
